item.title: Premium Potting Soil Now available in 40L bags
item.description:
Emmanuel Agro Enterprise Premium Potting Soil available in 40Liter bags.
40L fills 10 seedling trays of 104 holes.
Ideal for growing Flowers, Fruits and Vegetables.

Emmanuel Agro Enterprise Potting Soils gives you HEALTHIER roots!
Contact our office for details or fill the contact form and we will contact you!
item.dc:creator: monique

item.title: Corona update
item.description:
The whole world is dealing with the consequences of the coronavirus outbreak, which is severely affecting our daily lives.

 

The main concern in this situation is to stay safe and healthy. But regular business in many industries is also heavily impacted. This will last for some time to come and we need to work closely together to get through this period.

Health and safety first

 

To protect our employees and facilities and our external business partners, we have taken numerous internal measures, following the advice of national and global health organisations and authorities. All possible hygienic measures have been taken; the vast majority of our staff are working from home and no visitors are allowed at our stations. Orders can be collected on appointment and need to be pre-ordered by e-mail, on phone or WhatsApp. Customer appointments have been cancelled or are taking place by mail, phone, Skype WhatsApp. Field visits are being done on an individual basis. We will do our utmost to ensure that anyone connected with Emmanuel Agro Enterprise. is optimally protected against infection.

 

We are committed to ensuring consumers have continuous access to healthy vegetables, particularly in these exceptional times. Our horticultural supply business is at the beginning of the food supply chain. No vegetable seed means no vegetables production. To secure continuity of distribution of Enza zaden and Pop Vriend seeds in Nigeria, we have implemented extra safety protocols. We hope the Nigerian government will recognize our role in the food supply chain and will allow us to provide seeds and other essential supplies to farmers where circumstances permit during the period of full lockdown. We take this role seriously!

 

Do you need any support? 

Our local sales teams and customer services are in close contact with our customers to ensure continuity of their businesses. If you need any support, please don’t hesitate to contact any of our representatives. If we can help you at this difficult time, you can count on us to do so. There will be better times ahead in the near future! In the meantime, we will keep you posted via our websites and social platforms. 

Please take good care of yourselves, your families and people who need your support at this difficult time.
item.dc:creator: hein

item.title: Visit our trials
item.description:
At our premises in Kano we are running continuous trials.

Purpose of these trials:

·      Screening new varieties on added value and adaptability for the Nigerian market throughout the year in both dry and rainy season

·      Demonstration of improved seeds, comparison of local varieties to new imported quality seeds, both open pollinated and hybrid varieties

·      Demonstration of growing techniques and equipment

·      Demonstration of drip and spray tube irrigation

·      Demonstration on use of water-soluble fertilizers

 

You are most welcome to visit these trials and discuss with our staff.

Visiting is only possible on appointment.

 

Contact:

Chris Eronmomhen

Phone:    +234 803 305 4180

E-mail:     operations@terratiga.com

 

Umar Idris:

Phone:    +234 803 571 6863

E-mail:     umari149@gmail.com

 

Our premises are located at:

Km 16 Kwanar Dawaki,

Along Kano-Zaria Express Way.

Opposite Total filling Station

Kano

item.dc:creator: gouverneur

item.title: AGRONOMIST
item.description:
Vacancy

TERRATIGA LIMITED, a dynamic Agricultural and Agro-allied Trading company operating in West Africa with its regional office in Lagos Nigeria and Head office in The Netherlands, has a vacancy in Nigeria for the post of Agronomist.


Profile:

We are looking for an ambitious Female or Male who is a good team player, but also can function independently. The ideal candidate must be able to communicate in Hausa language. He or She should be responsible, accurate, proactive, analytical and is willing to relocate to any part of Nigeria.


Qualification:

To carry out your responsibilities, we give preference to candidates with at least Bsc. or HND, in Agricultural Science.


Experience:

Specific practical skills on crop production, Horticulture and farm management etc will be required. Experience in grain Production will be an advantage.


Remuneration:

Competitive salary according to qualification and experience.


Questions and Applications:

Kindly address your application to 4, Metal box road, Ogba industrial scheme, Lagos, Nigeria.
item.dc:creator: gouverneur
